title: New: Henri Bardot – Figurine
content:
Absolutely adore this fragile new track from Portland’s Henri Bardot.

There’s elements of James Blake in the production, and a delicate rawness to the vocal that’s hugely endearing. Lifted from a new seven track EP titled Blue Night, Figurine is out now. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
